title: How to think classic video games today will hold up in the generation of a few hundred years or beyond - Quora

response.answer_text: The classics will be classics. There will be videos about them on YouTube, or whatever streaming service in that time, but they won’t be holding a candle to the games of our future. Why? Because of the inevitable rise of totally immersive Virtual Gaming, in which you will be inside the game, or rather the game will be in your mind. People will fondly look back at GTA, RDR, WoW, DOTA like we do today at Prince, Pac-Man and Space invaders.

A: as long as there are new interested and curious minds and those old minds that enjoyed it, the classics will always find a way to come back Original Q: How do you think classic video games today will hold up in the generation of a few hundred years or beyond?
